mapper.select: SELECT *, ST_Distance_Sphere( point(longitude, latitude), point(#{longitude}, #{latitude}) ) AS distance FROM pet_api ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 10;
select count(*) from pet_api where category3 like #{category} and city_name like #{city} and facility_name like #{search}
select * from pet_api where category3 like #{category} and city_name like #{city} and facility_name like #{search} limit #{page}, 10;
